theta = np.arange(1.0, 100.0, 1.0) * u.arcmin
try:
    xi_plus = cosmo.shearTwoPoint(theta, z=2.0, settings=settings, kind='+')
    xi_minus = cosmo.shearTwoPoint(theta, z=2.0, settings=settings, kind='-')
except ImportError:
    return
fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(8, 8))
ax.plot(theta, xi_plus, label='$\\xi_+$')
ax.plot(theta, xi_minus, label='$\\xi_-$')
ax.set_xscale('log')
ax.set_xlabel('$\\theta(\\mathrm{arcmin})$', fontsize=18)
ax.set_ylabel('$\\xi(\\theta)$', fontsize=18)
ax.legend()
fig.savefig('2pt_nicaea.png')
